content: A `Link` component renders a semantic `<a>` tag. It can be styled with `size`, `color`, and `underline` props. It also supports a `isDisabled` state.
To create a link that opens in a new tab with `target='_blank'` and `rel='noopener noreferrer'`, use the `isExternal` prop. This will also show an external link icon by default.
By setting the `isBlock` prop, the link will be rendered as a block-level element with a hover effect, making a larger area clickable.
The `Link` component is designed to work seamlessly with client-side routers like Next.js and React Router. See the main Routing guide for setup.
